title: Topic 001 Question 010
body: You need to automatically apply a sensitivity label to documents that contain information about your company's network including computer names, IP addresses, and configuration information.
Which two objects should you use? Each correct answer presents part of the solution. (Choose two.)
NOTE: Each correct selection is worth one point.
options: a sensitive info type that uses a regular expression
a sensitive info type that uses keywords
a sensitivity label that has auto-labeling
